sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>changes model_domain type from choice to glide_list and updates read_only flag to false</description>
        <name>NLU - model_domain field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot()) {
        return;
    }
    var tables = NLUConstants.tables;
    var glideRecord = new GlideRecord(tables.SYS_DICTIONARY);
    glideRecord.addQuery('name', tables.SYS_NLU_MODEL);
    glideRecord.addQuery('element', 'model_domain');
    glideRecord.query();
    if (glideRecord.next()) {
        glideRecord.setValue('read_only', 'false');
        glideRecord.setValue('internal_type', 'glide_list');
        glideRecord.update();
        gs.info('NLU Model: Upgraded model_domain column to glide_list');
    }

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-10 05:09:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ae80a7f653313010ec1fddeeff7b127f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NLU - model_domain field</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ae80a7f653313010ec1fddeeff7b127f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-10 10:04:21</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
